Notes for Introduction to Analysis

24 Feb 2017

The first order of business is to upload my notes for a course Iâ€™m taking called Introduction to Analysis. It covers all of the basic topics a student might need to know before they can tackle on a Real Analysis course. I will also be uploading solutions to the problems in the textbook we are using for this course which is called Real Analysis and Foundations by Steven G. Krantz (4th Ed.).

The solutions of the textbook problems will start from section 4.3 which is on compactness on the real line. They can be downloaded here.
